title: His Hellion Hostage
description: Will a Rebellious Royal Finally Meet Her Match?Fallon is an ambitious Princess determined to overthrow a neighboring Kingdom, but when she is captured by Zoltaire, a hardened warrior tasked with foiling her plot, he soon recognizes certain traits in his spitfire hostage, and believes she harbors dark sexual fantasies.Spiriting her away in the dead of night, he locks her in an isolated cabin.Though Fallon fights for her freedom, she cannot deny the intense attraction sparking inside her. But unexpectedly she meets her arch enemy, the beautiful, purple-eyed Princess Lizbett.What happens when the fiery females find themselves face-to-face?Can their warrior lovers control their petulant Princesses?Throw yourself into a world where mighty men are trained in the erotic art of sensuous domination, a place with magic, mystery and decadent sex. Let your imagination soar. Anything can happenâ€¦and does. Pick up your copy and escape today.
author: Maggie Carpenter
